intro: Glossocardia linearifolia, commonly known as the narrow-leaved glossocardia, is a flowering plant native to parts of Africa. It is often found in grassy areas and along roadsides, thriving in tropical and subtropical climates. Due to its ornamental value and adaptability, it is sometimes cultivated in gardens.
